#### Introduction to R for Aquatic Research

<img src="./images/logos.png" alt="">

<br>
You will need to install some software before you arrive for the workshop. All software is <b> freely available </b> and <b> easily installed </b>. Please download and install the most recent versions prior to the workshop:

1. <b> Download and install R </b> for <a href=https://cran.r-project.org/bin/windows/base/> Windows </a> or <a href=http://cran.us.r-project.org/> Mac </a>. You should download the most recent version of R for your operating system. Most newer laptops are 64-bit.

2. <b> Once you have R installed, download and install <a href=https://www.rstudio.com/products/rstudio/download/#download> Rstudio </a>. </b> You should download the most recent version. This program will not work without an existing installation of R.

3. <b> Download the workshop data </b> from 
<a href= https://github.com/danStich/data4_r4nalms> this github repository</a> following the instructions in the `README.md` file.
